text: cūriyaṉ maṟaiyum (mēṟkut) ticaiyai avar aṭainta poḻutu cēṟṟuk kaṭalil cūriyaṉ maṟaivatai(p pōl) kaṇṭār. Avviṭattil oruvakai makkaḷaiyum kaṇṭār. (Nām avarai nōkki) ‘‘tulkarṉaiṉē! Nīr (ivarkaḷait taṇṭittu) vētaṉai ceyyavum, allatu avarkaḷukku naṉmai ceyyavum (iraṇṭukkum muḻu cutantiram umakku aḷittirukkiṟōm)'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉōm
